Text: I couldn't find this anywhere as some of the songs are trippy and I wanted it .... hope y'all like it.
OMG.  i will seed this forever!
The music video song isn't on here FYI:( But nice rips of the other songs!
Nice post Seismicsnap - I loved this music... I posted a torrent like this that has more stuff included- take a search and keep up the good work.

Torrent shouldn't be labelled as an OST if it's just a game rip (though appreciated).

Actually OST finally released after some prodding by the composer, Laura Shigihara on her Bandcamp page which includes all tracks + unreleased extras in several formats including FLAC.

http://laurashigihara.bandcamp.com/album/plants-vs-zombies-soundtrack

Only $3.99 USD, worth supporting imo (who else is making awesome old school gaming music like this anymore? Not many.)
